Coins: %1$d
A guy sitting in a big interrogation mark.
Settings
Time between each question (Automatic):
All questions
Beginner + Intermediate
Default: 9 seconds
Advanced:
Beginner:
Default: 9 seconds
Intermediate:
Aplly
How old are you?
-I\'m … years old
Do you have pets?
-I have a dog and two cats
Who is your best friend?
-My best friend is…
What’s your name?
-My name is…
Where are you from?
-I am from…
What company do you work for?
-I work for…
Where are you from?
-I am from…
Are you married?
–No , but looking for someone nice…
What time is it?
-It is 08:33 am
Can you describe your city or town?
Yes, it\'s big, have many buildings and a great airport.
Who do you live with?
–I live with my wife and children.
Do you prefer arts or sports?
-I prefer arts.
When do you do morning exercises?
-I often do morning exercises at 6am.
What Are Your Hobbies?
–I like playing football, reading books, skateboarding, swimming.
What’s your favorite food?
-My favorite food is…
What’s your favorite color?
-My favorite color is…
What do you study?
-I study English and…
Do you speak English?
-Yes, I do!
Can you play football?
-No, I play volleyball.
How are you?
-I am fine, thanks!
Why do you learn English?
-To get a better job.
What\'s your Job?
-I\'m a salesman.
Can you dance well?
-Yes, I can dance
Can you describe yourself in three words?
-I\'m small, strong and young.
How many people are in your family?
-Three people, me, my wife and my son.
What do you do in your free time?
I like reading and relaxing at home.
How was your day?
-Very productive.
Do you live in a house or an apartment?
-I live in a house.
What does your father do?
My father is a doctor. He works at the local hospital.
How old is your mother?
She is 40 years old.
Do you read books?
I read books almost every night.
What can you learn from books?
Science, languages, almost everything.
Where do you read books?
I read books at home, sometimes in the library.
Do you prefer traveling by car, train or plane?
-I prefer to travel by plane.
What’s your favorite website?
-I think it is youtube.com.
Who is your favorite singer?
I’m a big fan of Bruno Mars.
Do you have your own computer?
Yes, I own a laptop.
What fruits do you like?
I like apples and coconuts.
What annoys you most?
-When someone talk too much.
How old where you when you start working?
-I was seventeen years old.
What did you do on Saturday evening?
-We went to a party.
What motivates you to work hard?
-My family and my goals.
What would you sing at karaoke night?
-I would sing Michael Jackson!
What is your native language?
-My native language is Brazilian Portuguese.
What is the phone app you use most?
-I like to use Instagram.
What would you like right now?
-A cup of coffee
What do you like doing in your free time?
I like hanging out downtown with my friends
Where is the nearest bank?
-On the corner.
Why don\'t we go out?
-No, let\'s stay home.
What type of music do you like listening to?
I like listening to pop music.
Which country has the best food?
-Brazil, I guess.
Do you prefer pasta or rice?
-I prefer pasta with tomato paste
How would your friends describe you?
-A crazy and nice person.
What would you do if you won the lottery?
-I would travel and buy a big house.
Do you have any siblings?
–I have a brothers and two sisters.
Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
-I am somewhere in between.
How many children do you have?
–I don\'t have any children
What time do you get up?
-I usually get up at 5.30am.
Is there a bakery near here?
-Yes, it\'s just down the road.
What do you like to do on weekends?
-I like playing football, reading and listening to music.
What would you like to eat right now?
-I’d like a burger, chips and soda.
Does your family usually have dinner together?
-Yes, we do. My mom always prepares delicious meals for us.
Do you enjoy spicy food?
Yes, I do, especially on cold days.
How often do you eat out? Who do you go with?
-I often eat out on weekends, when I hang out with my friends.
How much do you usually pay when you eat out?
-It’s not very expensive, just around $10 for each meal.
Are you concerned about calories when eating out?
-Yes, I am. I’m on diet now, so this really matters to me.
Do you drink alcohol when eating out?
-No, not often. Just when I have parties with my friends.
Do your parents let you stay out late?
-Of course not. They always ask me to get home before 10 pm each night.
Is there any bookstore or library in your area?
-Unfortunately, there are none near my house.
What do you usually do during trips?
-I often go sightseeing, take pictures...
Do you prefer traveling alone or joining a guided tour?
-I love backpacking with my friends who share the same interests as me.
Can you read websites in English?
-Yes, I can. Most useful websites are written in English.
What did you want to be when you were a child?
-I dreamed of being a fashion designer.
Who was your childhood hero?
-Robin Hood, he took money from the rich and gave it to the poor.
-How many rooms are there in your house?
There are 6 rooms: a living room, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a kitchen.
What color is your bedroom painted?
-It’s painted blue, my favorite color.
Do you feel relaxed listening to music?
-Sure. I feel like there are no more worries in the world.
Why is music important to us?
-Music has the power of beautifying our life.
Do you usually go to bars or clubs?
-Not often. I sometimes go there on weekends.
Do you usually exercise?
-Yes, I do. Doing exercise is one of my good habits.
When did you start doing exercise?
-Just last year, actually.
What benefits can you get from exercising?
-Well, a lot. Exercise helps reduce fat and build muscles.
What do you use the computer for?
-I study and listen to music.
What song would make the best theme music for you?
What is the weirdest food combination you enjoy?
What is the worst date you have ever been on?
What is your idea of the perfect day?
Who knows the most secrets about you?
What are your must-have qualities in a best friend?
If you had to get a tattoo today, what would you get?
If you had to get a tattoo today, what would you get?
What does your mother yell at you when she’s angry?
What fictional character would you most like to be friends with?
What is your favorite topic to talk about?
What is your preferred method of communication?
Where is your happy place?
What would your dream house look like?
Which family member are you closest to?
What was your best birthday ever?
What is one goal you have for the near future?
What are you looking forward to this month?
What is one fact every friend should know about you?
What is your favorite word to say out loud?
What do you think the meaning of life is?
What do you think happens after death?
What is the biggest risk you have ever taken?
What is an ideal that is most worth sacrificing for?
What is one concept you cannot understand, no matter how hard you try?
What is the most unexpected turn your life took?
If you could change one historic event, which one would it be?
How do you make the world a better place?
What do you think we owe each other as human beings?
If you weren’t afraid of failure, what would you do differently?
What is the best thing in life?
How do you make tough decisions?
What is something that you wish you could say to someone you love?
What is something that wish someone would say to you?
What part of your identity do you believe will never change?
If you could choose a brand new name for yourself, what would it be?
If you could learn one skill instantly, what would it be?
If you were to write a book, what would it be about?
What is the best business idea you have ever had?
If you could un-invent one thing, what would it be?
